{{Quote|It's happening all over again. I can see it. My father's [[House Branfield|house]] was once mighty like [[House Forrester|this one]], but his loyalty to the [[House Targaryen|Targaryens]] cost us dearly.|[[Elissa Forrester]] reminiscing about Lord Branfield.|The Lost Lords}}

Lord '''Branfield''' was the head of [[House Branfield]], and father to [[Elissa Forrester|Elissa]] and [[Malcolm Branfield]]. He is mentioned in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.History:
===Background===
Lord Branfield was a [[House Targaryen|Targaryen]] loyalist, and fought for the crown during [[Robert's Rebellion]]. During the rebellion, he along with most of his sons and daughters were slain.

==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
In the codex, it's mentioned that Lord Branfield tried to marry Malcolm off several times, unsuccessfully.

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
During the wake for [[Ethan Forrester|Ethan]] and [[Gregor Forrester]], Elissa recalls that her father's house was once mighty like [[House Forrester]], but it fell because of his loyalty to the Targaryens.
